org.oddjob.framework

Class BasePrimary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oddjob.framework.BaseComponent
      • org.oddjob.framework.BasePrimary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArooaContextAware, ArooaSessionAware, PropertyChangeNotifier, Iconic, LogEnabled, Stateful
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveJob, GrabJob, MirrorState, ScheduleBase, SimpleJob, StructuralJob

    public abstract class BasePrimary
extends BaseComponent
implements LogEnabled
    An abstract implementation of a component which provides common functionality to concrete sub classes.
    Author:
    Rob Gordon
